author: mrglavas
msg: Improve performance of SymbolTable.addSymbol(String). In many instances the strings
we pass into this method are already internalized. In such cases calling String.hashCode()
will yield better performance than calculating a hash code ourselves. Updated hash(char[], int, int)
so that it will yield the same result as String.hashCode().

author: mrglavas
msg: Cleaning up usage of toString() in miscellaneous places in the code. Patch thanks to Dave Brosius.

author: mrglavas
msg: Cleaning up superfluous code. Patch thanks to Dave Brosius.
